text.p: These are the leading stories in the Mozambican press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Three sugar companies in Mauritius have formed the Societe Marromeu, an enterprise which will study the possibilities of resuming production at Sena Sugar Estates at Marromeu and Luabo on the banks of the Zambezi River in central Mozambique.

- Maputo police say they have taken measures to prevent further theft at the city's airport, which has been plagued by the robbery of its runway lights. The police would not reveal the measures taken but guaranteed they would have satisfactory effects.
